website_summaries.verdict: A good buy with a stylish design, but they are edged out by the numerous style options and renown quality of competing brands.
pros: Similar features to the other aviators on the market but not as costly
Gradient lenses and metal frames at a mid-range price
cons: Doesn't offer a variety of colors like other brands available

customer_reviews.title: Fierce!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses look awesome! I really love them. I considered giving only 4 stars because they could block the sun better, but... I love them too much! They aren't heavy, but don't feel cheap or flimsy either. I'm going to do my best not to lose these!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy G.

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful!!! Really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, yet durable, stylish and sporty. Best pair of sunglasses I've owned yet. Superior quality product. Great price looked just like the photos.. Very pleased. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging in excellent condition I just Love them thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of MK sunglasses. Which I've wanted for a long time. I just wasn't sure that I was responsible enough to pay that much for sunglasses and not lose them lol. I love this pair so much. I get compliments on them all of the time. Hopefully they will last a long time. These are definitely authentic Michael Kors glasses. They are nice and heavy. Great quality. Will buy a different pair next. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlieCCM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The frame is sturdy and there are no scratches on the lens. I love the color. They were packaged in a hard eyeglass case in a sturdy small box then placed in a shipping envelope. Not crushed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Good. Premium. Stylish. We leave this in our car’s glasses compartment as our backup sunglasses. It provides a look that works with any outfit we wear, while still protecting our eyes. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer (verified purchaser)

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My pair arrived last week and they are beautiful and durable sunglasses! They come in a Michael Kors case with a cleaning cloth.. I love them and find myself wanting to wear them when it's not even sunny outside!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: Like the mysterious style I adore No compliment here. Best purchase I made online do far I am on love Can't take them off!
customer_reviews.author: laurie wanager

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The images of the glasses look great! The quality looked very good but they didn't fit my face or something. Once I put them on I didn't care for them. It could be an evolution of the style and the young hipsters will like them. I wish I had because the marketing images look great and the quality seemed to very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: David E Brickey

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend LOVED these glasses
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend LOVED these glasses, her very first pair of nice glasses aside from the typical gas station kind you would normally get. They look great on her, excellent choice of a gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Porritt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunglassess as a gift I like it
customer_reviews.author: nesreen a.

customer_reviews.title: she loves 'em and has worn them every where we go (they look great on her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my GF, even though it's targeted for men. she asked for these pair specifically. she loves 'em and has worn them every where we go (they look great on her.)
customer_reviews.author: Hypnocil

customer_reviews.title: Too clear
customer_reviews.text: These are oddly clear lenses. You can see your eyes through them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carr

customer_reviews.title: The are the best sunglasses I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments when I wear these. The are the best sunglasses I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: D N

customer_reviews.title: Classy Look
customer_reviews.text: I love these shades. I get some many compliments when I have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Shanice Love

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend thought these glasses were very cool but the arms are not long enough to cover ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend thought these glasses were very cool but the arms are not long enough to cover his entire ears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit great, they are original
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, they are original ..just fabulous getting my prescription placed on it at the moment .. cause they can do that too!!!
customer_reviews.author: scraggls

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sunglasses!! Nothing else to say I just love them and I’m being very careful with them since I don’t have another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Susana camacho

customer_reviews.title: Buy the shades
customer_reviews.text: nice just what I was looking for. My new favorite shades. I hope I can keep up with these.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's MK
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sun glasses! Fit well and it's better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are nice but a little big for my face.
customer_reviews.author: TK Review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my fiancé and she absolutely loves them, bed tpricing I can find
customer_reviews.author: Jerry doctolero

customer_reviews.title: I’m not satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not good it’s not the one that I looking for
customer_reviews.author: rayan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Order was exactly as I expected and arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love my MK shades
customer_reviews.text: Def loved my MK sunglasses, I had previously lost a same pair. But I found these online and for a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Gricel Gtrrz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my wife was really happy with the present.!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Tristan

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Is Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. She is happy with it. I would give it 5 stars. However, I don't think that the price is worth it. The seller described it as "Made in: Imported". This is not the honest way - they were made in China, so write "Made in China".
customer_reviews.author: Marat

customer_reviews.title: They are by far my favorite ones! They fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of MK sunglasses in gun metal. They are by far my favorite ones! They fit perfect! And they have the perfect amount of shade. Comes with a nice case, and a cleaning cloth also. Very pleased! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I question the quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the sunglasses, since this is the most I have ever paid for sunglasses. After one week I noticed the sunglasses were very crooked on my face and had to take them to an eyeglass store and get them adjusted and it turns out the one side was bent which I know I received them like that because I always keep them in the case when not in use. Also, one of the lenses keeps popping out and that is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Govanni Tritch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses for my bf and he love them...thanks
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Women's MK5004 Gunmetal/Black/Grey Gradient Sunglasses, 59MM
